COPY.LABEL: Copy
COPY.DATA: Create a new Workspace with the data

CREATE.LABEL: Create
CREATE.ROLE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Role was not created.
CREATE.MENU.TOOLTIP: Create a new Menu Item below

MESSAGE.CREATE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Workspace was not created.
MESSAGE.MENU_ALREADY_EXIST: A Menu Item with that name/id already exists
MESSAGE.MENU_CREATE_OK: The Menu Item was created successfully
MESSAGE.MENU_CREATE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Menu Item was not created.

DELETE.LABEL: Delete
DELETE.MENU_MESSAGE: This will also delete all menu items below.
DELETE.MENU_OK: The Menu Item was deleted successfully
DELETE.MENU_NOK: An error has occurred. The Menu Item could not be deleted.
DELETE.ROLE_MESSAGE: This deletes the role and its assignments for the Workspace. Does not changed anycthing in Permission Management.
DELETE.ROLE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Role was not deleted.
DELETE.SLOT_MESSAGE: This deletes the assignment of Slot to Component for the Workspace.
DELETE.SLOT_OK: The assignment of Slot to Component was deleted successfully
DELETE.SLOT_NOK: An error has occurred. The Slot was not deleted.
DELETE.PRODUCTS_MESSAGE: The selected Applications and their apps are deregistered from the Workspace. Menu items that use such paths are not touched but no longer work.
DELETE.PRODUCTS_QUESTION: Do you want to deregister selected Applications?
DELETE.COMPONENTS_QUESTION: Do you want to deregister selected Components?

EDIT.LABEL: Edit
EDIT.ROLE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Role was not changed.
EDIT.SLOT_NOK: An error has occurred. The Slot was not changed.

MESSAGE.CHANGE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Workspace was not changed.
MESSAGE.MENU_CHANGE_OK: The Menu Item was changed successfully
MESSAGE.MENU_CHANGE_NOK: An error has occurred. The Menu Item was not changed.

EXPORT.LABEL: Export
EXPORT.MENU: Export Menu definition in JSON format
EXPORT.WORKSPACE: Download the current Workspace definition in JSON format.

IMPORT.LABEL: Import
IMPORT.WORKSPACE: Import Workspace definition in JSON format.

TOOLTIPS.MENU: Workspace Menu: Management of the menu structure
TOOLTIPS.ROLES: Workspace Roles: Management of the Roles usable by the Workspace (as an subset of tenant roles)
TOOLTIPS.SLOTS: Workspace Slots: Management of the Slots usable by the Workspace.
TOOLTIPS.PRODUCTS: Workspace Applications: Management of Applications usable in the Workspace

INTERNAL.OPERATOR_MESSAGE: This Workspace was created by the operator. All changes will be lost on the next deployment.

TOOLTIPS.CREATION_USER: ID of the user of the creation
TOOLTIPS.MODIFICATION_USER: ID of the user of the last change
TOOLTIPS.MANDATORY: If set then this Workspace is necessary for operation. The Workspace cannot therefore be deleted.
TOOLTIPS.OPERATOR: If set, the Workspace cannot be deleted and all changes will be lost during the next deployment.

TOOLTIPS.NAME: Unique name that cannot be changed because it is used as a reference to this workspace.
TOOLTIPS.DISPLAY_NAME: Displayed name of this workspace, can be changed
TOOLTIPS.DISABLED: If set then the workspace can be configured but cannot be used.
TOOLTIPS.HOME_PAGE: Home page of the workspace, which is displayed when no specific application is navigated to.
TOOLTIPS.BASE_URL: Base path in the workspace's web address
TOOLTIPS.FOOTER_LABEL: Label text displayed in the footer of the page

TOOLTIP.BADGE: Icon from the PrimeNG library which should be displayed next to the menu name
TOOLTIP.DISABLED: If set, then the menu item is not displayed
TOOLTIP.EXTERN: If set, the menu item exits the Workspace context
TOOLTIP.MENU_ID: A unique identifier of the menu item
TOOLTIP.PARENT_ID: The identifier of the parent menu item
TOOLTIP.PARENT_NAME: The name of the parent menu item
TOOLTIP.POSITION: An integer number that determines the position of the menu item in the menu structure
TOOLTIP.URL: The URL accessed by the menu item. Selection from list and/or manual changes/extensions possible.

HEADER.DETAIL: Display and editing of the Workspace properties

QUICK_LINKS.GOTO_WORKSPACE: Open Workspace in a new TAB

ROLE.ORIGIN.IAM: Role exists in Identity Access Management

SLOT.NEW.TOOLTIP: This Slot is not registered for the Workspace. Click to register.
SLOT.DEPRECATED.TOOLTIP: This Slot is outdated and will no longer be usable in the foreseeable future.
SLOT.UNDEPLOYED.TOOLTIP: This Slot is no longer usable.
SLOT.PRODUCTS.TOOLTIP: Applications that have registered this Slot
SLOT.NO_PRODUCTS: No Application found which has registered this Slot
SLOT.COMPONENTS.NOT_USED.TOOLTIP: List of available Components (extracted from Application Store)

MESSAGES.CREATE_NOK: An error has occurred during Slot registration
MESSAGES.REGISTRATION_NOK: An error has occurred during Component registration
MESSAGES.REGISTRATIONS_NOK: An error has occurred during Component registration
MESSAGES.DEREGISTRATION_NOK: An error has occurred during Component deregistration
MESSAGES.DEREGISTRATIONS_NOK: An error has occurred during Component deregistration

MENU.LABEL: Menu

HEADER.TREE_MODAL.TOOLTIP: Reorder of Menu Items via Drag & Drop and Preview in configured languages

TREE.POSITION.TOOLTIP: Position path of the menu item in format [parent item.]item
TREE.I18N.ROW.TOOLTIP: At least one translation is available
TREE.URL.TOOLTIP: The URL to be called upon activation
TREE.PRODUCT.TOOLTIP: Indicator whether the menu URL is offered by a registered Application
TREE.EXTERN.TOOLTIP: If checked then the Workspace is exit

MENU.MENU_ITEM_NOT_FOUND: Cannot find Menu Item with ID:

IMPORT.UPLOAD_INFO: Please, upload JSON file from your device. Keep in mind, that after upload whole menu structure will be overwritten.
IMPORT.UPLOAD_NOK: An error has occurred. The menu structure wasn't overwritten

PRODUCTS.PS_PRODUCTS.TOOLTIP: List of available Applications in Application Store which are not yet registered
PRODUCTS.UNDEPLOYED: This Application can no longer be used. Further use leads to error messages.
PRODUCTS.CHANGED_MFE: There are important changes in the Application.

MESSAGES.DOES_NOT_EXIST: The assigned Application does not exist
MESSAGES.ALREADY_EXISTS: The path is already in use
MESSAGES.UPDATE_NOK: An error has occurred during Application update
MESSAGES.REGISTRATION_NOK: An error has occurred during Application registration
MESSAGES.REGISTRATIONS_NOK: An error has occurred during Application registration
MESSAGES.DEREGISTRATION_NOK: An error has occurred during Application deregistration
MESSAGES.DEREGISTRATIONS_NOK: An error has occurred during Application deregistration

PRODUCT.BASE_URL.TOOLTIP: Base path for all Apps in the Application. Must be unique for all Applications in the Workspace.

MFE.APP_ID.TOOLTIP: Unique ID of the specific UI service to be used.
MFE.BASE_PATH.TOOLTIP: Path appended to the Application base path for accessing the specific Module.

WORKSPACE_EXPORT.THEME_CHECKBOX_MESSAGE: Download the current Workspace definition as JSON file.

WORKSPACE_IMPORT.THEME_NAME.TOOLTIP: Name of the used Themes. Can be changed later.
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.WORKSPACE_NAME.TOOLTIP: Unique name of the new Workspace. Uniqueness is checked in next step.
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.WORKSPACE_IMPORT_OK: The Workspace definition has been checked and can be imported.
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.WORKSPACE_EXISTS_MESSAGE: A Workspace with this name already exists. Its definition is overwritten.
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.BASE_URL.TOOLTIP: Base URL of the Workspace. Must be unique because it is used to access the Workspace. Uniqueness is checked in next step
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.BASE_URL_EXISTS_MESSAGE: A Workspace with this Base URL already exists. Using it again will likely cause problems.
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.RESPONSE.ERROR: An error occurred, the Workspace could not be created/updated.
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.INVALID_MENU_ITEMS: One or more menu items are not valid
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.VALIDATION_MENU_ITEM_KEY_MISSING: The key is missing in a menu item
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.VALIDATION_MENU_ITEM_NAME_MISSING: The name is missing in a menu item
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.VALIDATION_MENU_ITEM_WRONG_POSITION: In a menu item, the value for 'position' is not a number
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.VALIDATION_MENU_ITEM_WRONG_DISABLED: In a menu item, the value for 'disabled' is not a boolean
WORKSPACE_IMPORT.VALIDATION_MENU_ITEM_WRONG_WORKSPACEEXIT: In a menu item, the value for 'workspaceExit' is not a boolean

IMAGE.UPLOAD_FAIL: The file was not uploaded successfully
IMAGE.CONSTRAINT_FILE_TYPE: The following image formats are accepted: jpg, jpeg, png
IMAGE.CONSTRAINT_NAME: Please add a Workspace name before uploading a file.
IMAGE.CONSTRAINT_SIZE: The image file size exceeds the maximum length of 100,000 bytes.

TOOLTIPS.URL: As an alternative to uploading, a URL to an image can be specified here.

ERRORS.PARSE_ERROR: Parse error: The contained structure does not match the expected format.
ERRORS.PATTERN_ERROR: The input does not match the required pattern
ERRORS.FILETYPE_PATTERN_ERROR: The file does not match the allowed filetypes: .png, .jpg, .jpeg

HTTP_STATUS_0.WORKSPACE: Unknown problem retrieving Workspace details - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_0.WORKSPACES: Unknown problem retrieving Workspace data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_0.PRODUCTS: Unknown problem retrieving Application data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_0.SLOTS: Unknown problem retrieving Slot data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_0.MENUS: Unknown problem retrieving Menu data - please try again.

HTTP_STATUS_401.WORKSPACE: You are not authorized to see Workspace details.
HTTP_STATUS_401.WORKSPACES: You are not authorized to see Workspaces.
HTTP_STATUS_401.PRODUCTS: You are not authorized to see Applications.
HTTP_STATUS_401.SLOTS: You are not authorized to see Slots.
HTTP_STATUS_401.MENUS: You are not authorized to see Menus.

HTTP_STATUS_403.WORKSPACE: You have no permissions to see Workspace details.
HTTP_STATUS_403.WORKSPACES: You have no permissions to see Workspaces.
HTTP_STATUS_403.PRODUCTS: You have no permissions to see Applications.
HTTP_STATUS_403.SLOTS: You have no permissions to see Slots.
HTTP_STATUS_403.MENUS: You have no permissions to see Menus.

HTTP_STATUS_404.WORKSPACE: The Workspace could not be found.

HTTP_STATUS_500.WORKSPACE: Unknown server problem retrieving Workspace details - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_500.WORKSPACES: Unknown server problem retrieving Workspace data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_500.PRODUCTS: Unknown server problem retrieving Application data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_500.SLOTS: Unknown server problem retrieving Slot data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_500.MENUS: Unknown server problem retrieving Menu data - please try again.
